skills.name: Strafe
skills.description: Rapidly fires 2 shots, and may fire an additional shot by chance. The chance of firing an additional shot is equivalent to your Critical Rate.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Arrow Storm
skills.description: Attacks 4 random targets. Each attack has a 50% chance to deal Continuous Damage for 1 turn.
skills.level_progress_description:

Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Supportive Fire(Passive)
skills.description: Lays down supportive fire for allies under attack. Supportive Fire deals damage based on your Attack Power to enemies that attack your allies. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.
